text:
[Verse]
Feet splashing on the streets now
Rain falling down on me
Hands up spinning around
Feeling so wild and free

[Verse 2]
Clouds covering the skyline
But nothing can bring me down
Dancing in the raindrops
I could never need a crown

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Let the water wash the pain
Turning circles in the sky
Feel the joy and let it fly

[Verse 3]
Shoes soaked but I’m smiling
Every step a symphony
Streetlights start to shimmer
I’m lost in this melody

[Bridge]
The storm can never stop us
We’re racing with the drops
Together in the rainfall
Until the last beat hops

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Let the water wash the pain
Turning circles in the sky
Feel the joy and let it fly
title: Dancing in the Rain
